item.title: ::combat help :P
item.dc:creator: @gh0st_dr0pz gh0st dr0pz
item.description:
@gh0st_dr0pz wrote:

hey everyone… well im trying to add a ::combat command to my server.

if(command.startsWith(“combat”) && playerRights > 2){
int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
extraCb += combat;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

when i add this and try compile it i get the following error;

client.java:12328: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable extraCb
location: class client
extraCb += combat;
^

if you could help, please do.
thanks for you time

Read full topic
